ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of tomato soup
des: "A Southern child's classic comfort food. Serve over crackers or toast."
ins: Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat; stir the flour into the butter. Add the soup, milk, and sugar and stir until incorporated. Heat until just about to boil and stir the cheese into the mixture; cook and stir until the cheese is completely melted, but do not allow to boil.
